author: Telcontar
title: Smaller Than Expected, But Still Cool
review:
When I bought the Tower of Orthanc set at my local LEGO store the check out lady forgot to put the poster in the bag.  I didn't realize this until I got home.  I called back and two days later it arrived on my front steps via FedEx.  I have to say once I opened it up it seemed smaller than I expected.  Perhaps that's becasue I have the LEGO Hobbit Games poster from December and it's much bigger than this one.  Anyhow, this one is nice because there are different pictures on either side and you can choose which one you want to display.  I'm still undecided but I really like the picture on the back side of Gandalf flying on the eagle with Saruman looking on.  The other side has Saruman, Grima, the Mouth of Sauron, and lots of orcs in front of Orthanc.  What's even cooler is that they're actual pictures of the set, not computer models (like The Hobbit poster).  The paper on which it's printed on is good quality, but it comes folded which is annoying if you don't like creases.  Overall it's a nice little gift for buying Orthanc early.  If you're not a big LotR fan or poster collector I wouldn't bother getting it though.

Agoreg vae LEGO!
